fields.headline: Snuff Movie
fields.bodyText: (93 mins, 18) Directed by Bernard Rose; starring Jeroen Krabbe, Lisa Enos, Hugo Myatt, Joe Regan, Teri Harrison Bernard Rose, whose last film was the intriguing ivansxtc, has tripped up badly with Snuff Movie, an erotic horror movie about a director (Jeroen Krabbe) famous for making erotic horror movies. He's making a comeback with an erotic horror movie shot in the house where his wife and friends were killed the way the Manson gang descended on Polanski's wife and friends. Set in north London, filmed in Romania, the movie is no fun, makes little sense and takes itself rather seriously.
